message.description: A short description of the alert

AvsConnection.description: Transient information about an on-going connection to an AVS instance

serviceInitializationCompleted.description: Indicates whether service initialization is complete

serviceInitializationHandleEnc.description: Encoded service account credentials alongside connection information

folder.description: Name of the top-level folder in the datastore that contains the disk/volume

avsVmInternalId.description: VMware ID assigned to the disk/volume

avsVmResourceId.description: Azure resource ID of the AVS VM connected to this disk/volume

avsVmName.description: Name of the AVS VM connected to this disk/volume

avsStorageContainerResourceId.description: Azure resource ID of the AVS storage container containing this disk/volume

AvsStatus.description: Status of storage pool / AVS connection

avsEnabled.description: If true, an AVS connection has been successfully completed

sddcResourceId.description: Azure resource ID of the AVS SDDC the pool is connected to

AvsStorageContainer.description: AVS storage container resource type, representing a VMware storage container in a storage pool, which can be associated to and mounted as a datastore

properties.description: The resource-specific properties for this resource.

AvsStorageContainerListResult.description: The response of a AvsStorageContainer list operation.

value.description: The AvsStorageContainer items on this page

nextLink.description: The link to the next page of items

provisionedLimit.description: Maximum amount of bytes that can be provisioned in this storage container; it must be a multiple of 512; each time a volume is provisioned in this container, its provisionedSize will be counted against the provisionLimit and the provisioning will fail if it goes over (minimum: 1048576 (1MiB), maximum: 4503599627370496 (4PiB)); by default it is unrestricted

datastore.description: VMware datastore associated with this storage container (if any)

mounted.description: Whether the datastore is mounted in VMware or not

AvsStorageContainerVolume.description: A volume contained in an AVS storage container

properties.description: The resource-specific properties for this resource.

AvsStorageContainerVolumeListResult.description: The response of a AvsStorageContainerVolume list operation.

value.description: The AvsStorageContainerVolume items on this page

nextLink.description: The link to the next page of items

properties.description: The resource-specific properties for this resource.

AvsStorageContainerVolumeUpdatePropertie.description: The updatable properties of the AvsStorageContainerVolume.

AvsVm.description: AVS VM resource type, representing all the volumes associated to an AVS VM as defined by VMware

properties.description: The resource-specific properties for this resource.

vmId.description: ID of the AVS VM using this set of volumes

vmName.description: Name of the VMware VM using this set of volumes

vmType.description: Type of the VMware VM using this set of volumes

avsVmInternalId.description: Pure Storage's internal ID for this AVS VM

AvsVmListResult.description: The response of a AvsVm list operation.

value.description: The AvsVm items on this page

nextLink.description: The link to the next page of items

storagePoolInternalId.description: Pure Storage's internal ID for the storage pool

storagePoolResourceId.description: Azure resource ID of the storage pool

displayName.description: Human-readable name of the AVS VM

createdTimestamp.description: Date at which the AVS VM was created, as an RFC 3339 timestamp

volumeContainerType.description: Specify which control plane handles the lifecycle of the volume container

space.description: Contains properties related to used Flash space

AvsVmUpdate.description: The type used for update operations of the AvsVm.

properties.description: The resource-specific properties for this resource.

AvsVmUpdateProperties.description: The updatable properties of the AvsVm.

AvsVmVolume.description: Any volume associated to a particular AVS VM

Azure.ResourceManager.ResourceProvisioni.description: The provisioning state of a resource type.

avsEnabled.description: If true, an AVS SDDC is successfully connected to the storage pool

sddcResourceId.description: Azure resource ID of the AVS SDDC the storage pool is connected to

current.description: Number of bytes written and read per second (maximum value over the last 10 minutes)

provisioned.description: Bandwidth value currently provisioned for the storage pool, in MB/s

max.description: Maximum bandwidth value that can be provisioned for the storage pool

BillingUsageProperty.description: Represents an individual billing usage property

propertyId.description: Unique identifier for the billing usage property

propertyName.description: Name of the billing usage property

currentValue.description: Current value of the billing usage property

previousValue.description: Previous value of the billing usage property

statusMessage.description: Status message for the billing usage against a property

subProperties.description: Optional list of sub-properties providing additional details

HealthDetails.description: Health metrics for a storage pool

usedCapacityPercentage.description: How full the pool is right now, in %, compared to the maximum size it can grow to; estimated based on current usage and data reduction ratio

dataReductionRatio.description: Data reduction ratio achieved on this pool

estimatedMaxCapacity.description: Estimated maximum capacity of the pool, in bytes, based on current usage and data reduction ratio

HealthResponse.description: Health information for a storage pool

current.description: Current number of IOPS (maximum value over the last 10 minutes)

provisioned.description: IOPS value currently provisioned for the storage pool

max.description: Maximum IOPS value that can be provisioned for the storage pool

offerDetails.description: Offer details of the marketplace subscription

values.name: PendingFulfillmentStart
values.description: Marketplace subscription purchased but not yet activated

values.name: Suspended
values.description: Marketplace subscription suspended due to missing customer payment

LiftrBase.OfferDetails.description: Offer details for the marketplace that is selected by the user

publisherId.description: Publisher ID for the marketplace offer

offerId.description: Offer ID for the marketplace offer

planId.description: Plan ID for the marketplace offer

planName.description: Plan Name for the marketplace offer

termUnit.description: Term Unit for the marketplace offer

termId.description: Term ID for the marketplace offer

LiftrBase.ProvisioningState.description: The status of the current operation.

LiftrBase.email.description: Reusable representation of an email address.

storagePool.description: Limits used for storage pool resources

RangeLimits.description: Minimum and maximum values for a property

Reservation.description: Pure Storage cloud service resource type, also called reservation

properties.description: The resource-specific properties for this resource.

reservationInternalId.description: Pure Storage's internal ID for the reservation

ReservationBillingStatus.description: Latest billing status for this reservation

timestamp.description: Timestamp for the latest update of this billing status, in RFC 3339 format

totalUsedCapacityReported.description: Total used capacity as reported by associated storage pools. In bytes

lowDrrPoolCount.description: How many associated storage pools reported low data reduction ratio (DRR)

drrWeightedAverage.description: Weighted average of the data-reduction ratio for all associated pools

totalNonReducibleReported.description: The sum of total used capacity for all pools with low DRR, if the DRR penalty applies. In bytes

extraUsedCapacityNonReducible.description: Extra capacity added because of low DRR storage pools; In bytes

extraUsedCapacityLowUsageRounding.description: Extra capacity added when rounding up low-usage pools to 30TiB. In bytes

extraUsedCapacityNonReduciblePlanDiscoun.description: Extra capacity discounted due to plan forgiving some low-DRR usage. In bytes

totalUsedCapacityBilled.description: Total used capacity actually billed. In bytes

totalUsedCapacityIncludedPlan.description: Total used capacity included in plan. In bytes

totalUsedCapacityOverage.description: Total used capacity reported at on-demand price. In bytes

totalPerformanceReported.description: The sum of all performance settings across the pools under this reservation. In MB per second

totalPerformanceIncludedPlan.description: Total performance amount included in plan. In bytes per second

totalPerformanceOverage.description: Total performance amount reported at on-demand price. In MB per second

ReservationBillingUsageReport.description: Represents a billing usage report, including overall status and detailed properties

timestamp.description: Latest formatted billing report for this reservation

billingUsageProperties.description: A list of detailed billing usage properties

overallStatusMessage.description: Overall status message of the billing usage report

ReservationListResult.description: The response of a Reservation list operation.

value.description: The Reservation items on this page

nextLink.description: The link to the next page of items

ReservationUpdate.description: The type used for update operations of the Reservation.

properties.description: The resource-specific properties for this resource.

ReservationUpdateProperties.description: The updatable properties of the Reservation.

ServiceInitializationHandle.description: Initialization handle used to configure the AVS SDDC to communicate with the storage pool

sddcResourceId.description: Azure resource ID of the AVS SDDC the pool is connecting to

destroyed.description: If false, the resource is active; if true, the resource has been destroyed; resources can be soft-deleted by setting destroyed to true, and recovered by setting it to false

eradicationTimestamp.description: Date at which the resource will be eradicated and impossible to recover, as an RFC 3339 timestamp; invalid if destroyed is false;

destroyed.description: If false, the resource is active; if true, the resource has been destroyed; resources can be soft-deleted by setting destroyed to true, and recovered by setting it to false

totalUsed.description: Total space occupied by customer data (i.e., being billed for), in bytes

unique.description: Unique space occupied by customer data, in bytes; for a volume, this is the amount of storage that would be freed by deleting the volume, since snapshot and shared data would be kept

snapshots.description: Space occupied by data unique to one or more snapshots, in bytes

shared.description: Space occupied by duplicated data, meaning data shared with other volumes and snapshots as a result of data deduplication, in bytes

properties.description: The resource-specific properties for this resource.

identity.description: The managed service identities assigned to this resource.

sddcResourceId.description: Azure resource ID of the AVS SDDC to connect to

StoragePoolFinalizeAvsConnectionPost.description: FinalizeAvsConnection payload information, either encoded or explicit

StoragePoolLimits.description: Limits used for storage pool creation

provisionedBandwidthMbPerSec.description: Allowed provisioned bandwidth range for a storage pool, in MB/s

provisionedIops.description: Allowed provisioned IOPS range for a storage pool, as a number of operations

physicalAvailabilityZones.description: List of physical availability zones in the region in which storage pools can be deployed; some Azure regions do not support the necessary resources in all availability zones

StoragePoolListResult.description: The response of a StoragePool list operation.

value.description: The StoragePool items on this page

nextLink.description: The link to the next page of items

storagePoolInternalId.description: Pure Storage's internal ID of the storage pool

availabilityZone.description: Azure Availability Zone the Pool is located in

vnetInjection.description: Network properties of the storage pool

dataRetentionPeriod.description: How long a destroyed object is kept before being eradicated, in seconds

provisionedBandwidthMbPerSec.description: Total bandwidth provisioned for the pool, in MB/s

provisionedIops.description: Total I/O operations per second (IOPS) provisioned for the pool

reservationResourceId.description: Azure resource ID of the Pure Storage Cloud service (reservation resource) this storage pool belongs to

StoragePoolUpdate.description: The type used for update operations of the StoragePool.

identity.description: The managed service identities assigned to this resource.

properties.description: The resource-specific properties for this resource.

StoragePoolUpdateProperties.description: The updatable properties of the StoragePool.

provisionedBandwidthMbPerSec.description: Total bandwidth provisioned for the pool, in MB/s

UsageSeverity.description: Severity levels for billing usage properties

values.description: VM using vVols as underlying storage

VnetInjection.description: Network in which the storage pool will be made available

subnetId.description: Azure resource ID of the Virtual Network subnet where the storage pool will be connected

vnetId.description: Azure resource ID of the Virtual Network in which the subnet is located

VolumeContainerType.description: Specify which control plane handles the lifecycle of the volume container

provisionedSize.description: Provisioned size limits for a volume, in bytes

storagePoolInternalId.description: Pure Storage's internal ID for the storage pool containing the volume
